title: A Square block land for sale
details:
A Square block land for sale in Ramakrishna Lane, Off Ramakrishna Road.

Total 16 perches , suitable for residence or a commercial property. Easy access to Marine drive and Galle Road and close to Wellawatta Aprpico, Banks, Restaurants, Schools, Delmon Hospital, Wellawatta Beach and just 5 minutes to Wellawatta market via marine drive, and 10 minutes via Galle road.

Very convenient and secured place for residence.

8.5 Million per perch ( Negotiable)
